North America, the cradle of technological innovation, remains an essential market and home to nearly half of the world's largest companies. As a global service provider and end-to-end communications integrator, we understand your commercial objectives and the tools you need to digitally transform your business. We provide world-class solutions over a global footprint backed by local knowledge and support.

"A knowledgeable, hands-on communications partner is an indispensable part of our business strategy.”

11,400+

customer connections managed around the region.

Creating a network that’s ahead of your business

Fast-changing markets require the flexibility, efficiency, automation and speed of next-generation software-driven solutions, like SDN, NFV, uCPE and SD-WAN

Flexibility, performance, reliability and security are required by highly variable cloud, big data, IoT and mobile workloads

In our ultra-connected world, increasingly complex and sophisticated cyber threats are a reality that demands a comprehensive and proactive security approach

Fast-changing business models require flexibility across your organization

The ability to up- and down-scale capacity on demand is essential to support geographic expansion

IT teams need to work with different business functions to develop new, innovative customer insight and interaction channels

Service diversification and profitable growth requires the flexibility to easily add new cloud services or remove those that are outdated

Managing the life cycle of diverse IT environments is getting more complex

CIOs need to overcome higher regulatory, security and operational hurdles to move IT workloads and applications to the cloud

Employee productivity and customer experience are heavily impacted by data silos between business applications and functions

Managing enterprise applications and infrastructure is increasingly time-consuming and cost-prohibitive

Sharing knowledge and expertise encourages employee engagement and productivity

Incorporating new collaborative tools into business processes makes employees’ jobs easier

Collaboration, knowledge sharing and innovative working methods improve the efficiency and productivity of project teams, which in turn boosts companies’ growth

Employee expertise is among a company’s greatest assets; sharing that knowledge throughout the enterprise lets everyone benefit from it

Global products and services, local expertise

Our experience in North America can play a key role in your success. Our global experts help you transform your business to meet today’s digital demands.

We connect more than 360 multinational companies in North America to worldwide markets. The world's largest organizations choose Orange Business because we are a global operator who also understands the local business landscape

Full resilient network infrastructure using the latest network technologies, including SDN, NFV, SD-WAN and hybrid network solutions, all backed by proven cyber security solutions

Strong understanding of local markets to help you navigate hot issues, such as regulation, compliance, security and government wherever you do business in the world

Numerous certifications from our technology partners, including Cisco, Microsoft, Riverbed, Zscaler, Juniper and Polycom, as well as many business-standard certifications, such as ITIL®, ISO and PMI

Unrivaled customer experience throughout the region. Our local and global resources support you effectively in North America with world-class service from highly-qualified and certified teams

Our partners

Cisco’s technology portfolio addresses the most important business challenges with intelligent networks and technology architectures built on integrated products, services and software platforms. Together, we provide organizations all over the world with flexible, secure, efficient systems that bring your employees, customers and suppliers closer together.

Orange Business is delighted to be an inaugural Palo Alto Networks Prisma SASE Specialized Partner. The Palo Alto Networks security operating platform was designed to help our clients’ teams operate simply and efficiently to protect their organizations. It prevents successful attacks, including attacks in progress, to secure the enterprise, the cloud and the future.

Riverbed Technology provides a comprehensive WAN optimization solution that enable enterprises to share applications and data anywhere in the world. Partnering with Riverbed allows us to offer a range of solutions, from simple equipment resale to fully managed services.
